de.fhb.sailboat.gui
Class GUILogicImpl

java.lang.Object
  de.fhb.sailboat.gui.GUILogicImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUILogic
public class GUILogicImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements GUILogic

This class represents the program logic used by a GUInterface. It handles updating, sending and converting of value displayed and set via the GUI.

Author:
Patrick Rutter

initializeMissionMap

public void initializeMissionMap(javax.swing.JPanel missionMapPanel)
Initializes a Map Object and assigns it to the given panel. The map will fit itself to the size of the given panel and can be resized.

updateLogic

public void updateLogic()
This will be called once per gui_loop (see UPDATE_RATE) and can be used to manage timed tasks. Basic usage is to call update logic.

Specified by:
updateLogic in interface GUILogic
